turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi Dan, can you please order some pizzas from Happy's Pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, how many pizzas do you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd say three.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I presume you would like their special square pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Exacly, only square pizzas please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You want it deep dish?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How about the toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: See, I like pepperoni with mashroom and jalapeno. But one of my friends here is a vegetarian.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Then I'll order two pepperoni pizzas and one vegetarian special pizza. What do you think?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think that's great idea. Then make it three pepperoni pizzas and one vegetarian.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just to make sure - you want all of them large size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you need anything else on the side?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please. Two large pops and some breadsticks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That's all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, your order is placed. It'll be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks a lot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome.
